description: This table contains information on Home Health Procedure Charges.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Unique identifier for this contact for this patient.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: HH_CHARGE_ID
columns.description: Record ID of the procedure charge. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EAP table.

columns.name: HH_CHARGE_COMMENTS
columns.description: Comments added to the Home Health procedure charge.

columns.name: HH_CHARGE_USER_ID
columns.description: ID of the user who entered the charge.  Links to table CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: HH_CHARGE_EDT_INST
columns.description: The instant at which the charge was edited.

columns.name: HH_CHARGE_UCL_ID
columns.description: The Universal Charge Line record ID for the change, which is generated after the charge is routed from the clinical system to the billing system.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is populated only if you use IntraConnect.
